isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Crankcase, Crankshaft, and Camshaft - Installation - Main Bearings and Caps

caution.para: To avoid engine damage, use new main bearing cap bolts whenever the bearing caps are serviced.

note.para: The thrust bearing located at number 7 is found only in the upper half. All seven lower bearings share the same part number.

step1.para: Clean the Plastigage® from main bearing and or crankshaft journal surfaces.
Coat all bearing surface journals with clean engine oil.
Apply clean engine oil to main bearing bolts (threads and under head).
Place the No.1 through No.7 main bearing caps with the lower bearing inserts installed.

note.para: Make sure the main bearings are installed with the arrow pointing to the cam side and numbered from the front of the engine to the rear.

step1.para: Align and seat each of the main bearing caps.
